message.body: It's colder there than it is here! Also check out the hardcore history podcast, its super awesome
It is! They should've closed the school, the heating isn't above 60, and we're all freezing. Ok I will
Last week we had some -30 days, i didnt go out much
Oh jeez. It's only 2 degrees with -15 degree windchill. I would die with -30
We just had a fire drill and had to stand outside for the fire department to come. I hate cheltenham.
